title: Premium Stone Island Black Leather Jacket XXL, Excellent Condition
description:
Upgrade your style with this premium Stone Island black leather jacket (Size XXL). Featuring a detachable faux fur collar, beige cotton lining, and branded buttons, it offers both comfort and versatility. Includes side and internal pockets, adjustable side straps, and buttoned cuffs. Slim fit with 67 cm back length and 126 cm chest width. Excellent condition with authentic label.

Key Features:
- Condition: Excellent Condition
- Brand: Stone Island
- Size: XXL
- Material: Black leather
- Detachable faux fur collar
- Beige cotton lining
- Branded buttons
- Side and internal pockets
- Adjustable side straps
- Buttoned cuffs
- Slim fit
- Back length: 67 cm
- Chest width: 126 cm
- Authentic label

A rare find for collectors and fashion enthusiasts. Fast shipping and secure checkout at HappyDeel.
